accounts.name: bettor
docs: The user claiming the payout (and payer for ATA initialization)

accounts.name: pool_payment_token_account
docs: The pool's token account holding the funds (source of payout)

instructions.name: create_pool
docs: Create a new betting pool.
Calls the handler in `instructions::create_pool`.

accounts.name: yes_usdc
docs: Mint for the first token (Yes USDC)

accounts.name: no_usdc
docs: Mint for the second token (No USDC)

accounts.name: yes_points
docs: Mint for the third token (Yes Points)

accounts.name: metadata_yes_usdc
docs: Metadata account for Yes USDC token.

accounts.name: metadata_no_usdc
docs: Metadata account for No USDC token.

accounts.name: metadata_yes_points
docs: Metadata account for Yes Points token.

accounts.name: metadata_no_points
docs: Metadata account for No Points token.

instructions.name: initialize
docs: Initialize the BettingPools program
Similar to the constructor in the Solidity version

instructions.name: migrate_to_lmsr_pool
docs: Migrate a graded pool to an LMSR pool

accounts.name: authority
docs: The authority defined in the betting_pools state (fee recipient)

accounts.name: payment_mint
docs: The mint user is paying with (USDC or BetPoints).
Checked against betting_pools state.

accounts.name: bettor_payment_token_account
docs: Bettor's ATA for the payment token.

accounts.name: pool_payment_token_account
docs: Pool's ATA for the payment token (where payment is sent).
Needs to be initialized separately (e.g., via frontend or another instruction).

accounts.name: authority_token_account
docs: Fee destination token account (ATA). Authority is the betting_pools.authority

accounts.name: target_pool_mint
docs: The specific mint the user will receive (e.g., Yes-USDC).
Checked against one of the four pool mints below.

accounts.name: bettor_target_token_account
docs: Bettor's ATA for the target pool token.

instructions.name: set_media
docs: Update the media URL and type for a pool

instructions.name: set_payout_fee
docs: Set the payout fee for the protocol

instructions.name: set_trading_fees
docs: Set the trading fees for the protocol

accounts.name: betting_pools
docs: The betting pools state account to update

accounts.name: authority
docs: The authority that can change trading fees

accounts.name: system_program
docs: System program

errors.name: BetsCloseTimeInPast
errors.msg: Bets close time must be in the future

errors.name: BetsCloseAfterDecision
errors.msg: Bets close time must be before decision time

errors.name: PoolNotOpen
errors.msg: Pool is not open

errors.name: PoolDoesntExist
errors.msg: Pool doesn't exist

errors.name: BettingPeriodClosed
errors.msg: Betting period is closed

errors.name: InvalidOptionIndex
errors.msg: Invalid option index

errors.name: BetAlreadyExists
errors.msg: Bet already exists

errors.name: AlreadyInitialized
errors.msg: BettingPools is already initialized

errors.name: NotInitialized
errors.msg: BettingPools is not initialized

errors.name: ZeroAmount
errors.msg: Zero amount

errors.name: MinimumCollateralZero
errors.msg: Minimum collateral should be greater than zero

errors.name: InsufficientBalance
errors.msg: Insufficient balance

errors.name: NotAuthorized
errors.msg: Not authorized

errors.name: TokenTransferFailed
errors.msg: Token transfer failed

errors.name: PoolNotGraded
errors.msg: Pool not graded

errors.name: BetAlreadyPaidOut
errors.msg: Bet already paid out

errors.name: GradingError
errors.msg: Grading error

errors.name: BettingPeriodNotClosed
errors.msg: Betting period not closed

errors.name: InvalidPayoutFee
errors.msg: Invalid payout fee

errors.name: PoolAlreadyGraded
errors.msg: Pool already graded

errors.name: InvalidResponseOption
errors.msg: Invalid response option

errors.name: BettingNotInitialized
errors.msg: Betting not initialized

errors.name: ArithmeticOverflow
errors.msg: Arithmetic overflow

errors.name: InsufficientPaymentForMinimumOutput
errors.msg: Payment amount is less than the calculated cost for the minimum desired output.

errors.name: TokenAccountMismatch
errors.msg: The provided token account does not match the expected mint.

errors.name: SlippageExceeded
errors.msg: Slippage limit exceeded

errors.name: OraclePriceDeviationExceeded
errors.msg: Oracle price is outside the allowed deviation

errors.name: SlippageToleranceExceeded
errors.msg: Calculated output amount is less than the specified minimum output amount

errors.name: WinnerListFull
errors.msg: Winner list is full

errors.name: BetLost
errors.msg: Bet lost and cannot be claimed

errors.name: BetPoolMismatch
errors.msg: Bet pool mismatch

errors.name: NotBetOwner
errors.msg: Not the bet owner

errors.name: DivisionByZero
errors.msg: Division by zero

errors.name: CalculationOverflow
errors.msg: Calculation overflow

errors.name: InvalidVaultAuthority
errors.msg: Invalid vault authority

errors.name: UserTokenAccountMismatch
errors.msg: User token account does not belong to the user

errors.name: TokenMintMismatch
errors.msg: Token mint mismatch between user and vault accounts

errors.name: VaultMintMismatch
errors.msg: Vault token mint does not match bet token type

errors.name: InvalidAuthority
errors.msg: Provided authority does not match the one stored in the betting pools state.

errors.name: InsufficientVaultBalance
errors.msg: Insufficient funds in the vault for payout

errors.name: InvalidPaymentMint
errors.msg: The provided payment mint is not the configured USDC or BetPoints mint.

errors.name: PayoutCalculationError
errors.msg: Error during payout calculation logic.

errors.name: Underflow
errors.msg: Arithmetic underflow

errors.name: CannotMigrateEmptyPool
errors.msg: Cannot migrate an empty pool with no initial funding.

errors.name: PoolNotGradedOrResolved
errors.msg: Pool is not graded or resolved, cannot migrate.

errors.name: PoolAlreadyMigrated
errors.msg: Pool has already been migrated to LMSR.

errors.name: PoolNotMigrated
errors.msg: Pool is not migrated, cannot migrate to LMSR.

errors.name: LmsrPoolMismatch
errors.msg: LMSR pool does not match the original pool

errors.name: PoolIsDraw
errors.msg: Pool resulted in a draw, LMSR payout is not applicable.

errors.name: InsufficientOriginalPoolVaultBalance
errors.msg: Insufficient funds in the original pool vault to cover LMSR payout shortfall.

errors.name: InvalidVault
errors.msg: The provided LMSR collateral vault is invalid.

errors.name: InvalidMintDecimals
errors.msg: LMSR outcome token mint has invalid decimals.

errors.name: DecimalMismatch
errors.msg: Collateral token decimals do not match LMSR token decimals requirement.

errors.name: LmsrCalculationFailure
errors.msg: LMSR calculation failed due to iteration or convergence issue.

errors.name: LmsrMathError
errors.msg: A generic error occurred in an LMSR mathematical computation.

errors.name: InvalidBParameter
errors.msg: The b parameter for LMSR must be positive.

errors.name: PoolLocked
errors.msg: Pool is locked and cannot be used.

errors.name: PoolNotLocked
errors.msg: Pool is not locked and cannot be used.

errors.name: InsufficientTokens
errors.msg: Insufficient tokens to redeem.

errors.name: InvalidFee
errors.msg: Invalid fee value

errors.name: InsufficientFundsInPool
errors.msg: Insufficient funds in the pool for withdrawal.

errors.name: InsufficientFundsInSourceAccount
errors.msg: Insufficient funds in the source account for the transfer.

errors.name: InvalidAmount
errors.msg: Invalid Amount

errors.name: CannotGradePoolBeforeBettingPeriodCloses
errors.msg: Cannot grade pool before betting period closes at timestamp

errors.name: DecisionTimeOverrideInFuture
errors.msg: Decision time override cannot be in the future

errors.name: OracleNotFound
errors.msg: Oracle not found for the given pool.

errors.name: InvalidLmsrVaultOwner
errors.msg: LMSR collateral vault owner does not match LMSR pool PDA.

errors.name: InsufficientLmsrVaultBalance
errors.msg: Insufficient balance in LMSR collateral vault to cover shortfall.

errors.name: LmsrVaultNotProvided
errors.msg: LMSR vault not provided for fallback when LMSR pool context is present.

errors.name: LmsrPoolNotProvidedForVault
errors.msg: LMSR pool context not provided when LMSR collateral vault is present.

errors.name: InsufficientPoolVaultBalanceForPayout
errors.msg: Insufficient balance in the main pool vault for payout, and LMSR fallback not available or insufficient.

errors.name: InvalidLmsrPool
errors.msg: Invalid LMSR Pool for operation
